Add full taxonomy path to a Kraken report data frame — kraken_add_taxonomy
text: x data frame containing fields "rank_code", "scientific_name", "rank_level" rows original order Kraken sample report(s), returned read_kraken_reports().

title: Add full taxonomy path to a Kraken report data frame — kraken_add_taxonomy
text: can apply function data frame Kraken reports multiple samples; however, typically inefficient due needing recompute paths taxa appear multiple samples. Instead, consider generating taxonomy paths original database joining kraken report data frame.

what: Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports — read_kraken_reports
title: Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports — read_kraken_reports
text: function can read one Kraken(2) sample reports, well output kraken2-inspect. Kraken2 reports without minimizer data supported.

title: Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports — read_kraken_reports
Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports — read_kraken_reports
text: files Paths files minimizers Boolean specifying whether files include minimizer data id string NULL. string, create column name storing files names files vector num_threads Parameter passed onto readr::read_tsv()

title: Read one or more Kraken2 sample reports — read_kraken_reports
text: column names resulting data frame "clade_fragments_percent", "clade_fragments", "node_fragments", "minimizers_total", "minimizers_distinct", "rank_code", "taxid", "scientific_name"; minimizer columns included minimizers = TRUE. function work Kraken Kraken2 reports well output kraken2-inspect, tested original Kraken reports. Currently check whether minimizer data reports ; minimizers set incorrectly, function return without error reports parsed incorrectly. Kraken2 docs Kraken docs
